Posts.Content: laguapagirl wrote: I just had a mammogram and ultrasound today and Dr,'s found a suspicious lump as well as a concentrated area of calcification and smaller areas of calcification throughout.  I am scheduled to have two different types of biopsies but have to wait 16 days for the first one!  Is this normal to have to wait that long?  I had to wait a week for the mammogram after the Dr. verified a lump and that was hard enough.  I could use a little advice... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Wait two weeks for biopsies laguapagirl kartay5

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2012 02:01PM laguapagirl wrote: Thanks for the thoughts everyone.  The Dr.'s office called me and found something for me the day after tomorrow.  Relieved I won't have to wait too long, but nervous to find out.
Posts.Title: Wait two weeks for biopsies laguapagirl kartay5

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2012 09:46AM laguapagirl wrote: the scheduler did say she would watch for a cancellation and move me up if found.  We are in a isolated valley with just the one hospital so it's probably fairly busy.
Posts.Title: Wait two weeks for biopsies laguapagirl kartay5

Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2012 02:24PM laguapagirl wrote: Hi Shannon,  I am in a very similar situation.  Also 37, also just diagnosed with IDC, the surgeon here just recommended mastectomy to me.  My youngest is 4 but he is my little buddy who never wants to leave my side.  I don't have any nuggets of wisdom and wish you had more support where you are but maybe we can help each other as best as we can. I live 1 1/2 hours from the Huntsman Cancer Institue in SLC and am scheduled to go see a surgeon there in a couple of weeks.  She has a video link that I think will interest and hopefully help you too.  http://www.huntsmancancer.org/index.php?tmpl=component&option=com_jedirectory&view=lightbox_dis&itemid=304&f_type=4&vimeolink=1&Itemid=99&f_name=aHR0cDovL3ZpbWVvLmNvbS8yMzA0NjUyMQ%3D%3D&video_w=600&video_h=450 Okay, that looks really long after I pasted it, but I am pretty sure it will work.  The video is titled Options for Surgery but there is a lot of other good info in there too. Just knowing we are not alone, and having these forums helps me a ton.  I will send hope and good thoughts your way! Rachel
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed Infiltrating Ductal Carcinoma shopejones shopejones
